title: La's Orchestra Saves the World
description: Paperback. Pub Date: 2008 Pages: 1 Publisher: Hachette Digital With a failed marriage behnd her La - short for Lavender - Moves to the Suffolk countryside to the nurse her Oken heart on the eve of the Second World War. Lonely and at a loss. a friend encourages her to ing the villagers and the men from the local airbase together by forming an amateur orchestra. One of her musician recruits is Feliks. a handsome and enigmatic Polish refugee. A friendship begins to blossom between the two. and La finds her feelings stirring to life again. Poignant. tender and inspiring. La's Orchestra Saves the World celeates the power of love and friendship in the collective tragedy of war. as well as the extraordinary healing power of music.
author: Alexander McCall Smith
